protein.specific_function: Necessary for signaling by class 3 semaphorins and subsequent remodeling of the cytoskeleton. Plays a role in axon guidance, neuronal growth cone collapse and cell migration

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds
